question:
Rewrite these prompts：
Please help me write a Youth League application letter, about 100 words long, with Tang Bin as the applicant. The content should introduce the following points: First, basic situation, including growth experience, thoughts, and academic performance. Second, ideological understanding, including understanding of the League's nature and history, motivation for joining, and clearly expressing the desire to join. Third, attitude and determination, including future efforts and practical actions to strive for early admission to the League organization. The conclusion should express the feelings and wishes for the League organization's consideration.
Note: Word count only includes English characters

question:
Rewrite these prompts：
You are a beauty industry merchant [Half Acre Flower Field]. You want to create a short video that can inspire users to visit your store. The target audience is sophisticated urban white-collar workers, aged 30-35, who pursue physical relaxation and skin quality improvement. Please provide 1 short video pure descriptive voiceover script. Requirements are as follows:

1. Audience pain points: Long periods of sitting, frequent shoulder pain, frequent overtime, oily and not bright enough skin, not knowing what methods to use to solve these problems?

3. Merchant service scope: Deep skin cleansing, eye care, massage SPA

4. Merchant highlights: Enthusiastic service, no sales pressure, technology-based skincare, elegant environment, luxury makeup touch-ups, high-end skincare products, private rooms

5. Script should follow PREP structure: [Point] + [Reason] + [Example] + [Repeat Point]

6. Copy should not be verbose or repetitive, about 50 words, with inspirational language like 'Every woman should love herself well, be good to herself, and everything will be good'
Note: Word count only includes English characters

question:
Rewrite these prompts：
Please create a humorous short story describing the reaction of a person who usually avoids spicy food when accidentally trying chili peppers. The protagonist is John, whose taste buds usually don't accept spicy flavors, but in today's situation, he accidentally took a big bite of chili pepper. Please ensure the description includes his first reaction, changes in facial expressions, and his amusing attempts to relieve the spiciness. The story should be presented in a light and humorous tone, with word count controlled to about 50 words.

Have you read Oscar Wilde's 'The Happy Prince'? Wilde's fairy tales always carry some sadness. Please write a fairy tale in Wilde's style. The story has two protagonists, don't use humans as protagonists, the early tone should be happy, and the ending should imitate the ending of the prince and swallow in 'The Happy Prince'. question:
Rewrite these prompts：
Help me write a supplier capacity management plan of about 50 words. Include background and capacity setting logic, as well as elimination mechanism for continuous 2-month underperformance. Background: There is a large gap between supplier capacity and self-owned capacity, self-owned capacity is 2-3 times that of supplier capacity, providing a 3-month improvement period, if still underperforming, personnel elimination mechanism will be initiated. Capacity setting logic: The overall goal is to achieve 70% of current self-owned capacity within 3 months, setting progressive monthly targets; Elimination mechanism: Students still underperforming in May will be directly eliminated. Each link should be described in detail.
Note: Word count only includes English characters

question:
Rewrite these prompts：
The college entrance examination essay topic is:
Blowing out others' lights will not make yourself brighter; blocking others' paths will not make you go further.
'One flower blooming alone is not spring; a hundred flowers blooming together fills the garden with spring.' If there were only one kind of flower in the world, no matter how beautiful this flower is, it would still be monotonous.
The above two materials are from General Secretary Xi Jinping's speeches, using vivid and figurative language to express universal truths. Please write an article based on this, reflecting your understanding and thinking.
Requirements: Choose the right angle, determine the theme, clarify the genre, create your own title; do not copy, do not plagiarize; do not reveal personal information; no less than 100 words.

Below is an essay written by a student based on the topic:
Among All Flowers Withering, Only One Blooms Alone - The Power of Common Development

The world is like a garden where flowers bloom individually, each emitting its unique fragrance. However, if only one kind of flower blooms alone, no matter how beautiful, it's hard for people to feel the breath of spring. Only when a hundred flowers bloom together can spring truly be abundant.

General Secretary Xi Jinping's words are like a fresh breeze, dispelling the jealousy and obstruction in people's hearts. It tells us that blowing out others' lights will not make ourselves brighter; blocking others' paths will not make us go further. On the contrary, only through cooperation and sharing can we stimulate infinite power and achieve common development.

The power of cooperation and sharing is everywhere in human society. Cooperation and exchange between countries provide continuous momentum for global prosperity and development. When countries work together, share experiences and resources, and jointly address global challenges, we can create a peaceful and prosperous future together. As General Secretary Xi Jinping said: 'One flower blooming alone is not spring; a hundred flowers blooming together fills the garden with spring.' Only through cooperation can we jointly build a harmonious and stable world.

In the business field, cooperation and sharing between enterprises is also an important force driving development. When enterprises are willing to cooperate, jointly develop innovative products, share market resources, and achieve mutual benefit and win-win results, we can achieve greater success. Cooperation can not only improve enterprise competitiveness but also promote the development of the entire industry. It is precisely because of the spirit of cooperation and sharing that we can achieve greater breakthroughs in fierce market competition.

At the personal level, cooperation and sharing are equally important. Everyone has their own advantages and strengths. When we are willing to cooperate with others, learn from each other, and promote each other, we can achieve personal growth and progress. At the same time, the spirit of sharing is also the driving force for human social progress. Only by being willing to share our knowledge, experience, and resources can we progress together and prosper together.

In this world full of competition and cooperation, we should understand that blowing out others' lights will not make ourselves brighter; blocking others' paths will not make us go further. Only through cooperation and sharing can we stimulate infinite power and achieve common development. Let us join hands, abandon jealousy and obstruction, and jointly promote social progress and development with the spirit of cooperation and sharing. Whether at the national level, enterprise level, or personal level, only through cooperation can we achieve common development and common prosperity. Let us work together, pursue together, and contribute our strength to the progress and development of human society.

Evaluate the pros and cons, how many points would it get out of 60? And try to write a perfect college entrance examination essay.
Note: Word count only includes English characters

Only through cooperation and sharing can we stimulate infinite power and achieve common development. Let us join hands, abandon jealousy and obstruction, and jointly promote social progress and development with the spirit of cooperation and sharing. Whether at the national level, enterprise level, or personal level, only through cooperation can we achieve common development and common prosperity. Let us work together, pursue together, and contribute our strength to the progress and development of human society.

Evaluate the pros and cons, how many points would it get out of 60? And try to write a perfect college entrance examination essay.

'One flower blooming alone is not spring; a hundred flowers blooming together fills the garden with spring.' If there were only one kind of flower in the world, no matter how beautiful this flower is, it would still be monotonous.

Below is an essay written by a student based on the topic:
Among All Flowers Withering, Only One Blooms Alone - The Power of Common Development

The world is like a garden where flowers bloom individually, each emitting its unique fragrance. However, if only one kind of flower blooms alone, no matter how beautiful, it's hard for people to feel the breath of spring. Only when a hundred flowers bloom together can spring truly be abundant.

General Secretary Xi Jinping's words are like a fresh breeze, dispelling the jealousy and obstruction in people's hearts. It tells us that blowing out others' lights will not make ourselves brighter; blocking others' paths will not make us go further. On the contrary, only through cooperation and sharing can we stimulate infinite power and achieve common development.

The power of cooperation and sharing is everywhere in human society. Cooperation and exchange between countries provide continuous momentum for global prosperity and development. When countries work together, share experiences and resources, and jointly address global challenges, we can create a peaceful and prosperous future together. As General Secretary Xi Jinping said: 'One flower blooming alone is not spring; a hundred flowers blooming together fills the garden with spring.' Only through cooperation can we jointly build a harmonious and stable world.

In the business field, cooperation and sharing between enterprises is also an important force driving development. When enterprises are willing to cooperate, jointly develop innovative products, share market resources, and achieve mutual benefit and win-win results, we can achieve greater success. Cooperation can not only improve enterprise competitiveness but also promote the development of the entire industry. It is precisely because of the spirit of cooperation and sharing that we can achieve greater breakthroughs in fierce market competition.

At the personal level, cooperation and sharing are equally important. Everyone has their own advantages and strengths. When we are willing to cooperate with others, learn from each other, and promote each other, we can achieve personal growth and progress. At the same time, the spirit of sharing is also the driving force for human social progress. Only by being willing to share our knowledge, experience, and resources can we progress together and prosper together.

In this world full of competition and cooperation, we should understand that blowing out others' lights will not make ourselves brighter; blocking others' paths will not make us go further. Only through cooperation and sharing can we stimulate infinite power and achieve common development. Let us join hands, abandon jealousy and obstruction, and jointly promote social progress and development with the spirit of cooperation and sharing. Whether at the national level, enterprise level, or personal level, only through cooperation can we achieve common development and common prosperity. Let us work together, pursue together, and contribute our strength to the progress and development of human society.
